metadata.title: CVE-2019-15680 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains null pointer dereference inHandleZlibBPP function, which results Denial of System (DoS). This attackappear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
x11vnc package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
ssvnc package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vncsnapshot package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
tightvnc package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
